info.task: open an empty collapsed combobox by typing character
info.title: Open an empty, collapsed combobox by typing a character

user: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox without moving into the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox without moving into the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to expanded) is conveyed
Text of the automatically completed option ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
